sentences.cn: 居丧和天职是不容推托的.

sentences.en: Eg : It is an undeniable fact that environmental pollution becomes increasingly serious.
sentences.cn: 环境污染变得越来越严峻是不可否认的事实.
他具有不可否认的魅力。

sentences.en: HIIT is what It'says – high - intensity – and the results are undeniable.
sentences.cn: 我们称HIIT是高强度的,他的结果不可否认.

sentences.en: His skill is undeniable but he works too slowly.
sentences.cn: 他的技术确实是优秀的,但他工作得太慢了.

sentences.en: However, it is undeniable that there are still some problems and limitations.
sentences.cn: 但不可否认的是, 它也存在着不可避免的问题与局限.

sentences.en: It is undeniable that the economic picture is brightening.
sentences.cn: 不可否认经济状况正在好转。

sentences.en: That all great art has this power of suggesting a world beyond is undeniable.
sentences.cn: 不可否认,一切伟大的艺术都具有使人有超尘脱俗的浮想的力量.

sentences.en: That's why the tripod was here, to record proof, undeniable proof.
sentences.cn: 所以才要用三脚架记录下证据, 铁证如山!

sentences.en: The fact of dissatisfaction is undeniable.
sentences.cn: 事实虽令人不满,但却无可争辩.

sentences.en: The fact that water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen is undeniable.
sentences.cn: 水是由氢和氧化合而成这一事实是无可否认的.

sentences.en: There was waste and there was want of proportion, but there was undeniable achievement.
sentences.cn: 虽然有浪费现象,虽然需要协调, 但成绩是确凿无疑的.

sentences.en: We may doubt aspects of the solution, but the crisis is undeniable.
sentences.cn: 我们也许会怀疑解决方案的某些方面, 但危机是不可否认的.

sentences.en: What was undeniable was the wide appeal of this popular humour.
sentences.cn: 无可否认的是这种大众幽默非常受人欢迎.

words.tran_cn: 不可否认地；确凿无疑地
不可否认的；公认优秀的；无可争辩的

trans.tran_cn: 不可否认的，无法抵赖的，无可争辩的，确实优秀的，无可疵议的
